select productid,name,price from product where name like replace(name,' ','') like '%'||?||'%'

select name,productid from( select p.name,p.productid,count(o.status),row_number()over(order by count(o.status) desc) rnum from product p,order_detail od,orders o where p.productid=od.productid and o.orderid = od.orderid and o.status='구매확정' group by p.name,p.productid,o.status ) where rnum between 1 and 5
